Schedule

Note: This schedule is subject to change (as needed). In addition, unless otherwise indicated, tutorials are always due on Wednesday at 11:59PM and homework is always due on Friday at 11:59PM.

Week Lesson Topic Due
Week 1 04/01/22 Fri, 04/01 Lesson 1 Introduction
  • Intro to the course
04/02/22 Sat, 04/02 HW0 Sign up for a Tutorial Session
Week 2 04/06/22 Wed, 04/06 Lesson 2 The Building Blocks
  • Variables, operators, data types, and built-in functions
04/07/22 Thu, 04/07 Tutorial 1 Get Python Running
04/08/22 Fri, 04/08 Lesson 3 Intro to Lists & Tuples; Intro to the Command Line
  • Intro to the command line
  • Lists and tuples (sequences)
04/09/22 Sat, 04/09 HW1 Installation & Introductory Exercises
Week 3 04/13/22 Wed, 04/13 Lesson 4 Introduction to Functions
  • Some useful built-in functions
  • Parameters and arguments
04/14/22 Thu, 04/14 Tutorial 2 Practice with Functions
04/15/22 Fri, 04/15 Lesson 5 Creating Your Own Functions
  • Creating your own functions
  • Defining versus invoking functions
04/16/22 Sat, 04/16 HW2 Intro to Tkinter
Week 4 04/20/22 Wed, 04/20 Lesson 6 Modules and Variable Scope
  • Creating modules
  • Global and local variables
04/21/22 Thu, 04/21 Tutorial 3 Practice with Parameters & Arguments

QUIZ 1

04/29/22 Fri, 04/29 Lesson 9 While Loops
  • What do you want to repeat?
  • How long do you want to repeat it?
  • What changes each time (optional)?
Week 6 05/04/22 Wed, 05/04 Lesson 10 For Loops
  • Intro to for loops syntax
  • Using for loops with lists and sequences
05/05/22 Thu, 05/05 Tutorial 5 For Loops Activity
05/06/22 Fri, 05/06 Lesson 11 User Inputs & Events
  • Expanding your I/O repertoire
  • Click, drag, and keyboard events
05/07/22 Sat, 05/07 HW4 Animations & Landscapes

QUIZ 2

05/14/22 Sat, 05/14 P1 Make an Interactive Animation
Week 8 05/18/22 Wed, 05/18 Lesson 13 More on Files & Strings + Error Handling

05/19/22 Thu, 05/19 Tutorial 7 Working With Files
05/20/22 Fri, 05/20 Lesson 14 Dictionaries

Week 9 05/25/22 Wed, 05/25 Lesson 15 Dictionaries
  • Creating, reading, and updating a dictionary
  • Dictionaries as lookup tables
05/26/22 Thu, 05/26 Tutorial 8 Error Handling
05/27/22 Fri, 05/27 Lesson 16 Dictionary Algorithms

05/28/22 Sat, 05/28 HW5 Tic Tac Toe
